About me

My name is Pavel Mráz (21)
I'm from the Czech Republic and I live in small city (about 10.000 people).

Things what I like:

  • Spending time with my girlfriend ❤
  • Drink coffee
  • Coding
  • Programming
  • Playing computer games
  • Good meal

Things what I don't like:

  • Cleaning
  • Drink alcohol
  • Wake up early
  • Doctor's
  • Bad day's
